title: new_game
body:
Select your vessel to pour knowledge into...
*rattle* Good.
Find their bodies, stop the repeat.

title: day_1_intro
body:
The cabby pulled up to the swimming training center's dirt parking.
Cab Driver: "Here we are!"
Cab Driver: "You take care now!"
Time to step out of the car.
I thank the cabby, he nods then drives down the soggy dirt road.
[Player Character]: "*Phew* That was a long drive! Looks like the rest of the team got here faster."
We managed to get a great price booking multiple rides up the mountain.
I went inside the building to meet up with the rest of the team.

title: intro_reception_area
body:
Yep.
I'm the last to arrive...
[Player Character]: "Hey everyone! Sorry I'm late."
[Player Character]: "Okay, gather around and let's go over some ground rules..."
Captain: "Oh [current_character.name], you made it! I can assign you your job."
Captain: "Aside from training, we have to maintain this place for the owners."
Captain: "So with that in mind, here is the plan..."
I'll go over the schedule of training and working.
Everyone seems to be pretty receptive and willing.
[Player Character]: "Now... give me a second."
I take my notebook out of my bag and list out everyone's job...
Captain: "[current_character.name], your job will be to keep the pool cleaned and make energy drinks for the team."
Captain: "Everything you need will be in the janitor's closet in the pool room. Here are the keys."
Captain: "Okay, I think everyone is here and has a something to do!"
Lastly for me. I will be making energy drinks for everyone and keeping the pool clean with chemical in the janitors closet.
I remember one of the owners telling me there are instructions in the janitor's closet.
Captain: "We will be here for 10 days, so train hard!"

title: day_1_chaos_01
body:
I felt strange the moment I got out of the cabby's car...
I could feel parts of me shrinking and growing!
[Player Character]: "Huh!?"
[Player Character]: "Wha- whats happening to me!"
Quickly, I turn back to the car!
I see the cabby driver slam the door shut and speeds off down the road...
[Player Character]: "wha-"
Something felt familiar when I stepped out of the car.
I saw some of the swim team running at me shouting!
THE CAR! THE CAR!
Before I could react, I heard the car door slam shut!
The cabby speeds down the road in a blaze of dust!
[Player Character]: "wha-"

title: day_2_intro
body:
I'm awake...
I must have woken up super early.\nIt's still a bit dark out.
[Player Character]: "Ow..."
My body feels so sore... We didn't train THAT hard.
I hear a lot of commotion outside? But.. we don't have any practice scheduled this early.
I decide to get out of bed to check it out.
[Player Character]: "Huh?"
[Player Character]: "...What happened to me!?"
The voices outside get louder!
In a panic, I run out to the courtyard.
[Player Character]: "GAH!"
Instinctively, I put my arm over my chest to keep it from wobbling and kept going.
[Player Character]: "mpf..."

title: day_2_courtyard_area
body:
The courtyard is in complete chaos.
Most everyone is panicking and some are crying.
Everyone's panicking....
[Player Character]: "Everyone focus! What do we know so far?"
Captain: "Everyone focus! What do we know so far?"
So many people were trying to talk at the same time..
[Player Character]: "Okay ENOUGH!. Sorry... Everyone listen."
The room fell silent. Everyone look at me with expecting eyes.
[Player Character]: "...Well... someone here has to show some leadership! Right?"
Captain: "Okay ENOUGH!. Sorry... Everyone listen."
We started at the Captain.
Captain: "...Well... someone here has to show some leadership! Right?"
The group fell into murmurs and others still inspecting themselves.
[Player Character]: "...So. Obviously we need to figure out what happened..."
I need to think... First, despite the changes everyone is relatively fine.
[Player Character]: "Okay... Health wise we are all still fine..."
Uh oh, some of the swimmers looked annoyed at that comment...
Captain: "..I mean, like, we can still move normally and none of us are bed ridden."
Captain: "With that in mind... I'm going issue out some new jobs."
There were some small groans in our crowd.
Captain: "Just relax... the jobs are to help us find a solution.When I call your name we can talk about what you should do."
After sometime...
Everyone's been assigned. Now for my own responsibilities...
We still need to maintain the facility... I guess have to keep the pool cleaned.
A lot of personal things were stolen last night. Clothes, belongings...
Whats worse is a lot of food and equipment were taken too, according to most of the team.
This is bad. Really bad....
This facility is high up on the mountain and... pretty far from the city.
.....
That weird dream I had last night... I need to write down what I saw and heard.
Looking around I can see some of the places I dreamt. Thankfully, before running out I spotted my notepad and pen. So those weren't stolen..
I'll put it in my room with some locations the team can check on this afternoon.
Hopefully they will find what was promised...
Heh... I must have really lost my mind.. but this is all I got going right now.  Alright...
[Player Character]: "Okay everyone! We all have stuff to do, keep your eyes peeled, and don't slack on your training!"
Captain: "...So. Obviously we need to figure out what happened..."
Captain goes silent to think.
Captain: "Okay... Health wise we are all still fine..."
Some people looked annoyed at that comment...
Captain: "..I mean, like, we can still move normally and none of us are bed ridden."
Captain: "With that in mind... I'm going issue out some new jobs."
There were some small groans in our crowd.
Captain: "Just relax... the jobs are to help us find a solution.When I call your name we can talk about what you should do."
After sometime...
Captain: "Last one again... haha..\n[current_character.name], come over here."
Captain: "We still need to maintain the facility as part of the renting agreement."
Captain: "That means I'll still need you to keep the pool clean..."
Captain: "A... A lot of personal things were stolen last night."
Captain: "Whats worse is a lot of food and equipment were taken too, according to most of the team."
Captain: "..."
[Player Character]: "Do... Do we need to find food and water?"
Captain: "...yeah. This facility is high up on the mountain and pretty far from any city I know of.."
[Player Character]: "...T-this is not good."
Captain: "Call me crazy, but I had this weird dream last night."
[Player Character]: "...?"
Captain: "...Look, trust me on this. I put a notepad in your room with some locations around us."
The Captain explains what was written.
Captain: "...So just let each of us know or write in the notepad where you want us to look for food and water."
Captain: "Leave the notebook outside your room before you rest for the day and we can take care of the rest."
[Player Character]: "Okay.. I'll see what I can do."
Captain: "Thank you..."
The captain turns their attention to the rest of the team.
Captain: "Okay everyone! We all have stuff to do, keep your eyes peeled, and don't slack on your training!"
The team nodded skeptically and we dispersed.

title: swimmer_dialogue_01
body:
Diver: "...w-was it something I ate?"
Diver: "I feel so sore.."
Lifter: "My muscles...*sniffle* All that training... No!"
Lifter: "I won't give in too... whatever is going on!"

title: swimmer_dialogue_02
body:
Diver: "I did some stretching... ate food.."
Diver: "When I was resting, it felt like any other night... did I miss something obvious last night?"
Lifter: "I checked out the shed before bed."
Lifter: "...but I just wanted to see the tools in there.."
Singer: "All my stuff vanished, gone and I'm wet!"
Singer: "I... I need to sit down.."
Sailer: "I texted my father letting him know I made it, before playing on my phone..."
Sailer: "I didn't have anything to do with this!"
Dancer: "I sat in my room after practice!"
Dancer: "I was on my phone looking at b..."
Dancer: "um.. I-I didn't see anything!"
Reader: "When I woke up, I was drenched in water.."
Reader: "All of my clothing are gone... but... the books I took from the library are still in my room."
Spotter: "I didn't see anything suspicious yesterday!"
Spotter: "I don't know why it hurts to move too.. We just did a couple of laps!"
Eater: "Nothing out of the ordinary... I think?"
Eater: "I cooked as planned and then woke up... like this..."

title: day_3_intro
body:
[Player Character]: "Huh?"
[Player Character]: "I didn't wake up wet this time..."
[Player Character]: "AH!"
Me and bed sheets are soaked with water...
....
[Player Character]: "...M-my chest and legs got bigger... my voice! Oh no..."
...
[Player Character]: "It's g-gone... this insane..."
[Player Character]: "No changes today..."
[Player Character]: "...I feel more like myself today."
Like yesterday there is commotion outside
....
[Player Character]: "Alright, we gotta get out there..."
I put my arm over my chest to keep my breasts still
[Player Character]: "mpf..."
I try to ignore how sensitive my nipples are as I slowly walk to the courtyard.
[Player Character]: "Okay, lets check on everyone else."
I head down to the courtyard
[Player Character]: "Okay, lets check on everyone else."
I head down to the courtyard

title: day_3_courtyard_area
body:
[Player Character]: "Everyone's here? Lets take figure out what everyone found yesterday..."
Captain: "Everyone's here? Lets take figure out what everyone found yesterday..."
I didn't see anything unusual. I did wake up wet and.. and everything about me got bigger
*tears begin to swell up around their eyes*
It's okay, come over here.
... I didn't change since yesterday
... My body didn't change last night and I woke up wet too. I didn't see anything yesterday unusual.
...
[Player Character]: "...Hey are you okay?"
Captain: "...Hey are you okay?"
Did anyone here voice in their dreams...
The group seems to get uncomfortable at the question.
N-no... at least I don't remember.
The rest of the group seemed to agree...
Captain: "Well lets keep trying to find answers...."
Captain: "Remember to check the note I leave on my door to see what needs to be gathered.."
Captain: "...and if anyone sees anything, well, scream.. Anything to get our attention!"
Captain: "Well lets keep trying to find answers. [current_character.name]... how is the pool maintenance?"
[Player Character]: "Something about the pool is different"
[Player Character]: "It has a light purple ish color now"
[Player Character]: "I got the chems in the pool yesterday"
[Player Character]: "Didn't see anything out of the ordinary..."
Captain: "Thanks for keeping up with that..."
The group quietly disperses..

title: swimmer_dialogue_d3_01
body:
Diver: "...w-was it something I ate?"
Diver: "I feel so sore.."
Lifter: "My muscles...*sniffle* All that training... No!"
Lifter: "I won't give in too... whatever is going on!"

body:
Diver: "I did some stretching... ate food.."
Diver: "When I was resting, it felt like any other night... did I miss something obvious last night?"
Lifter: "I checked out the shed before bed."
Lifter: "...but I just wanted to see the tools in there.."
Singer: "All my stuff vanished, gone and I'm wet!"
Singer: "I... I need to sit down.."
Sailer: "I texted my father letting him know I made it, before playing on my phone..."
Sailer: "I didn't have anything to do with this!"
Dancer: "I sat in my room after practice!"
Dancer: "I was on my phone looking at b..."
Dancer: "um.. I-I didn't see anything!"
Reader: "When I woke up, I was drenched in water.."
Reader: "All of my clothing are gone... but... the books I took from the library are still in my room."
Spotter: "I didn't see anything suspicious yesterday!"
Spotter: "I don't know why it hurts to move too.. We just did a couple of laps!"
Eater: "Nothing out of the ordinary... I think?"
Eater: "I cooked as planned and then woke up... like this..."

title: day_4_intro
body:
... ‚êÑ‚Ñê‚ëì‚Øä‚£ò‚≥™‚àÉ‚ôù‚çì‚ÅÖ‚ó©‚Öû‚ñè‚Åä‚çô‚ú∞‚§º‚•©‚ëá‚ü∑‚Ö∏‚å©‚ãá‚áØ‚Øñ‚®é‚Æ´‚Éà‚êä‚Øï‚º®‚≤∑‚Øº‚éö‚®™‚∏∏‚âí‚≥ú‚ôö‚≤µ‚øû‚ÜÑ‚¢ú‚í¢‚¢ò‚µê‚î∂‚ÅÇ‚≥ë‚Ñ¨‚µá‚åû‚ö∂‚ã∂‚≤é‚©ö ...
[Player Character]: "AHHH!"
My head is pounding, a familar feeling since I arrived at the training center.
... ‚£ò‚≥™‚ó©‚Öû‚ñè‚ôÄ‚êÑ‚Ñê‚Åä? ...
[Player Character]: "stop... please..."
That voice again, every dream...
‚Ö∏‚å©‚ãá‚áØ
With those simple words, I began to relax.
Time seemed to pass, and Ill I had to do is answer a singular question over and over.
What pure form stirs your soul to pursue?
Images danced in my mind, each time I was asked.
All of them kinda of looked like me... some I felt more excited about.
I compelled to continually choose.. until...
[Player Character]: "....Ah.. my head..."
*I hear other groans around me*
[Player Character]: "...wah? w-why are we in the the backyard?"
WAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!
No! I can't take this! I don't understand!
Some of the teammates start to cry and run out of fear.
Fear hit me next. I began checked myself.
[Player Character]: "I'm not wet this morning"
The rest of the swimmers and I were soaked again...
My skin felt cold.
Naturally, my head tilted down to check my body.
[Player Character]: "...I keep changing.."
...
The scary part for me...
I couldnt stop thinking about how far I could go.
A horrible mix of fear and bliss.
[Player Character]: "No changes today..."
For a split second, I felt like I had to be disappointed in myself.
[Player Character]: "Back a bit more to myself"
Thoughts went through my head... anger... though at seemingly nothing.
I can't... I can't handle this...
The transformations, the fear in their eyes...
I take seat near the tree..
What am I now? Does it even matter?
No, I have to keep it together. I-I'm the one who got us into this mess.. right?
....
...My sister would probably know what to do.. or at least do what I'm doing better..
....
I rest my head on my arms, trying to gather the strength to keep going.
... ‚êÑ‚Øº‚éö‚øû...
Okay... I'll keep trying. I will protect us.
I get up and go to the Captain.
He... she? Whatever they are now, is sitting in the backyard thinking.
I can see the dried tears on their face.
Captain: ".... Is the pool still clean?"
[Player Character]: "...yeah"
Captain: "Thanks..."
Captain rests his head on his arms.

title: day_5_intro
body:
...‚µá‚åû‚ö∂‚êÑ‚Ñê‚ëì‚Øä‚í¢‚¢ò‚µê‚î∂‚ÅÇ‚≥ë‚Ñ¨‚£ò‚≥™‚àÉ ‚Æ´‚Éà‚êä‚Øï‚º®‚≤∑‚Øº‚ëá‚ü∑‚Ö∏‚éö‚®™‚∏∏ ‚âí‚≥ú‚ÅÖ‚ó©‚Öû‚ñè‚Åä‚å©‚ãá‚áØ‚Øñ‚®é‚≤é‚©ö ...
I walked over to the chair that appeared..
Mirrors with images of... me? kinda... appeared before me and without thinking to deeply...
[Player Character]: "I think I like that one the most..."
..‚êÑ‚Ñê‚ëì‚Øä‚í¢‚¢ò‚µê! ...
It's praise made me feel warm and happy inside...
More mirrors appear and happily I keep choosing for what feel like hours or maybe days...
[Player Character]: "This one is my favorite of all..."
..‚êÑ‚Ñê‚ëì‚Øä‚í¢‚¢ò‚µê ‚Øï‚º®‚≤∑‚Øº‚ëá‚î∂‚ôÄ‚êÑ‚Ñ¨‚£ò!  ‚âí ‚âí ‚âí.
Then praise and bliss happened throughout the rest of the dream...
[Player Character]: "Oh my back..."
[Player Character]: "..."
Panic settles in. For the first time, I woke up alone...
[Player Character]: "Huff.. Huff.. Where is everyone?"
Shaking, I cautiously get up.
[Player Character]: "I'm not wet this morning. That's' good at least..."
I could feel the water dripping off of me.
As if waking up alone wasn't bad enough...
Am I'm the only one left?
.... huff huff...
My heart feels like its constricting... and...  It's getting tough to breath.
I need to get out of here. There has to someone still with me!
I take a deep breath and rush toward the door.
I search room after room, calling everyone's names.
Captain: "*sniffle* Please anyone! Someone please be here..."
Captain!?
Oh gods! Finally a voice!
*sniffle* Captain!
I find them huddle in the shed. Relief floods through me.
[Player Character]: "Is everyone okay? Is anyone hurt?"
They start gathering around me. Some are crying and surprisingly some are still sleeping...
We all woke up here and you weren't here... H-How did you get through the door!?
I feel tears building up... I didn't even register what they said.
[Player Character]: "I-I don't know.... I'm just glad we are all safe. I couldn't... I couldn't..."
The words catch in my throat.
[Player Character]: "Please e-everyone, keep trying your best to figure whats going on."
[Player Character]: "I'll check up on you all before we go to bed..."
[Player Character]: "and... I promise no one will hurt us.."
We share a moment of reassurance...
... ‚≥ú‚ôö‚≤µ‚øû‚ÜÑ‚¢ú‚í¢...
[Player Character]: "I will to protect you all... no matter what.."
After giving them all a hug, go on with our days..
The door swings wide open...
Captain: "[current_character]! Are you okay!?"
The captain has tears streaming down their eyes. I could feel tears building up in mine too...
The other swimmers pour in and console me.
Captain: "We all woke up in different rooms, but we found each other fast! I could have sworn we checked this room before!"
*sniffle* I was so cold in the reception area...
Captain: "I'm glad we are all safe. I couldn't... I couldn't..."
The captain began to chock on their words...
Deep breaths, deep breaths
I think the captain is trying to say they wouldn't want to lose any of us
The captain nods
Captain: "Please e-everyone, keep trying your best to figure whats going on."
With that we meekly give each other reassurance and hug, then go on with our days.

title: day_6_intro
body:
...
I was surrounded by nothingness...
‚¢ò‚µê ‚ó©‚Öû
Then... scattered all over the nothingness pillars of titanium blue light spewed from the ground.
I could feel an immense, incomprehensible sadness building inside of me.
The pillars of light surrounded themselves with tiny mirror shards that reflected faces I've never seen.
Then I began to see myself.. myself at the beginning...
[Player Character]: "I DON'T UNDERSTAND!! STOP! PL-"
I could have sworn I heard... or rather felt a sardonic laughter...
Then the un-shattered mirrors with morphed images of me appeared... I began to relax and pick.
And like nothing happened... the light faded... the shards disappeared... and...
[Player Character]: "I like that one..."
[Player Character]: "*cough* *cough*"
I began to wake up on what felt like... dirt?
[Player Character]: "Huh?"
I wobbled up to my feet and before I processed anything... my mind fixed on the vista through the dirt road and trees...
Something about it filled me with dread.
[Player Character]: "Does everyone feel it too?"
Most nod.. somewhat nervously..
Last night... that dream... It felt so real...
[Player Character]: "It was weird, I dreamed of lights pouring out of the ground over there..."
Ha! That's funny I dreamt something like that too
...I dreamt the same thing too.
[Player Character]: "Wait..."
I look around at everyone.
[Player Character]: "....Did you all dream the same thing too?"
They all nod.
.....
This can't be happening. We all had the SAME dream?
I- I don't know what to say.... What even...
One of the team member proudly pumps out their chest...
Well you all can mope around, I'm gonna understand what the dreams are trying to tell us and get out of here!
The confidence lifts some spirits. I see a few pity smiles.
[Player Character]: "Okay... Right. Lets keep searching... and take a shower."
Some people laugh and we start the day..
Captain: "[current_character]... Do you feel the same feeling?"
[Player Character]: "Yeah, I'm not sure whats going to happen..."
Captain: "It was weird, last night I dreamed of lights pouring out of the ground... I felt real.."
Ha!, That's funny I dreamt something like that too, though I don't remember all the...
I dreamt the same thing too!
[Player Character]: "....."
Captain looks around at all of us.
Captain: "....Did you all dream the same thing too?"
We all nodded out heads.
Captain: "....."
Captains looked like a deer in headlights at the realization. The silence among the group was unbearable.
One of the team member proudly pumps out their chest...
Well you all can mope around, I'm gonna understand what the dreams are trying to tell us and get out of here!
The confidence lifted some of the swimmers spirits a bit and I could catch a glimpse of some smiles.
Captain: "..."
[Player Character]: "Than Ill keep looking around too."
Captain: "Also don't forget about cleaning the pool."
Everyone paused for a second and laughed
The Captain's face turned red with embarrassment and a shy smile at the absurdity of it all.
[Player Character]: "Don't worry, I'll keep the pool clean too."
We all had a good laugh or giggle, then started the day.

title: day_7_intro
body:
I couldn't sleep....
Rather... I was afraid to sleep.
...
hmmmmmm.... I wonder how everyone else is doing tonight.
Peering over the building's corner I spot two teammate talking to each other.
As I get near.. A strong sent filled my nose..
[Player Character]: "There you-"
[Player Character]: "There- There- There-"
My throat... I can't  get any words out!
Did you hear something?
[Player Character]: "I need to get to the pool..."
Pool?
The aroma lingered in ways I can't explain.. I needed it.
[Player Character]: "....."
I need to get to the water... why?
My body starts moving towards the pool!
... ‚≥ú‚ôö‚≤µ‚øû‚ÜÑ‚¢ú‚í¢!
I know.. I need to stop! But I NEED this!
[Player Character]: "pool....."
Then everything went dark.
The full moon is out tonight... it's pretty...
...
I heard footsteps coming closer...
Hey, uhh. Mind if I hang out with you? I don't wanna sleep...
[Player Character]: "Sure"
...
...
...hey
[Player Character]: "yeah?"
...so I been wandering around facility watching people.
...I feel like the captain is trying his best, but after the morning he seems unphased by whats happening...
[Player Character]: "What do you mean?"
I dunno... I think it's just weird.
...
Anyways you look great..
[Player Character]: "ha.. you too."
...
Captain: "There you two are!"
Captain: "I was worried sick you all got taken away or lost"
[Player Character]: "Ha! Nope, were just out here admiring the sky before going to bed."
...yeah
Captain: "Alright! Did you clean the pool?"
Just then the Captain's face went blank
Captain: "pool? pool... pool.."
Captain! Are you alright?
The captain starts slowly walking back to the facility
Captain: "..."
Where is he going?
I think we should.... pool...
[Player Character]: "Hey! Sto... pool..."
Then everything went dark.

title: day_7_womens_locker_room
body:
...
That one... stop... the vicissitude...
[Player Character]: "Ah!"
I woke up dry today!
Im getting use to waking up wet and finding something to dry off
What a horrible thing to adapt to...
I looked down and I a pile of towels I slept on
Captain: "Uuuuuh my head... Is everyone okay?"
Nothing but murmurs spread through out the team...
Captain: "...What happened last night?"
I look around, all I get is blank... hazy stares...
I'm not doing to great either... My head feels heavy.
l‚≤µ‚øûst‚≤µ‚øûn...
What- I- I can almost understand...
Hehe... NOW! ‚º®‚≤∑-
A wave of information filled my head so fast... I.. I think I know what to do.
Captain: "Alright!"
Everyone perked up
Captain: "Girls and guys, we need to make a new plan."
Captain: "We will buddy up. Something is happening to us... I think."
I strike a manly pose to cheer everyone up.
Captain: "Okay, lets partner up and keep finding more clues.. I have a good feeling about today!"
Captain: "Uuuuuh my head... Is everyone okay?"
Everyone seems to have a slight headache...
Captain: "[current_character.name]... What happened last night?"
[Player Character]: "I don't really remember... we were talking and then it all went black."
[Player Character]: "None of us seemed sleepy.."
Captain: "Okay... we will try and figure out more today."
Captain: "Alright!"
Everyone perked up
Captain: "Girls and guys, we need to make a new plan."
Captain: "[current_character.name] will keep doing the same task."
Captain: "As for the rest of you all, we need to buddy up. Something is happening to... I think."
The captain strikes a feminine pose
Captain: "Okay, lets partner up and keep finding more clues"
The captain gives me a wink, which I took as my cue to leave.

title: day_8_intro
body:
...
A couple of mirrors flies down, and I see my reflection in each one.
Then my appearance slightly changes in each one...
Like... always? As it should... then ...I choose my favorite.
[Player Character]: "I looove that one!"
I point to the mirror holding the reflection I love.
The mirror shatters.
...
..!
I stood up from the chair.
I felt incredibly heavy...
The pillars of light began to sprout out of the ground in every direction!
The blinding light quickly envolopes my dreams world.
[Player Character]: "AH! Ahhhhh!"
It feels like bliss... but...
[Player Character]: "mhmm hmmm hmmm... zzzz..."
I rustle around in bed trying to find the right sleeping angle...
bed... Bed!?
I spring to my feet
[Player Character]: "Ah! I'm still waking up soaked..."
[Player Character]: "At least im waking up in a bed now."
I take a look around the room, but nothing seems out of place for once.
I should check on everyone. Make sure they're all okay.
Today we need to start practicing... for something.. It's really important I feel..
A slight relief goes through my head... everything is a blur...
Focus. Just... focus on getting ready.
[Player Character]: "... Okay, let's do this!"
*knock* *knock* *knock*
Captain: "Heey, I'm coming iiiin."
Captain: "Everyone is in the reception room waiting for you!"
Captain: "The wind picked up a little bit last night, so it's a bit cold."
Captain: "We all woke up wet... but that's okay we like swimming... right?"
Captain: "....... It's fun swimming with you all."
Captain's face starts to contort with confusion
[Player Character]: "Sooooorry Captain, I got really sleepy last night heehee."
Then a slight pain went through my head... everything is a blur...
[Player Character]: "Ill be down there soon."
Captain is holding their head like me...
Captain: "..okay, thanks!"
They leaves my dorm room.
[Player Character]: "... Time to get ready."
I put on the clothing I have.
I get on my bed, so I can look at myself in the mirror.
...
[Player Character]: "Huh... This is me... right?"
[Player Character]: "Maybe I can go farther...?"
My head gets blurry... farther? I've always looked like this...
I turn back to the mirror.
[Player Character]: "I'm looking better everyday! heehee!"
I do a pose and then head out to the team...

title: day_8_outside_intro
body:
Heeeeey!!!
Everyone was sooo happy to see each other.
They're all here! Everyone's smiling!
[Player Character]: "Alright so-"
Just then a rumble violently shook the ground.
[Player Character]: "Whoa!"
I fall to the ground with a bit of cushion..
[Player Character]: "OW!"
I look around - some of the team is on the floor, the others are holding onto each other.
The ground begins to calm down.
[Player Character]: "Yeah...thankfully it's over. Everyone safe?"
Most are able to nod.
[Player Character]: "hmmmm... hmmm.. Okaaaaay... Well I'll listen and see why this happened."
[Player Character]: "Let's do our best today team! Find clues and have a great day!"
Woooooooooooo!
Captain: "Okaaay, okay... Ah!"
Captain: "Alright so lets start. [current_character.name] did you..."
Just then a small rumble shook the ground.
[Player Character]: "Whoa!"
I lean over the counter to keep my balance.
AH!
I look around some of the team is on the floor, the others are holding onto each other.
The ground beings to calm down.
[Player Character]: "Ah that was scaaary."
Captain: "Yeah...thankfully it's over. Everyone safe?"
The team and I nod.
Captain: "hmmmm... hmmm.. Okaaaaay."
Captain: "Let's do our best today team! Find clues and have a great day!"
Woooooooooooo!
We all disperse and continue with our days... finding clues...?

title: day_9_intro
body:
....
[Player Character]: "...Where am I?"
A faint, annoyed laugh could be heard in what I feels like wind.
I begin to take in my surroundings.
The light filled me with an bliss.. it was almost unnerving.
Shards of mirrors are floating and reflecting off the bright light.
I can see some shaking... trying to reform.
[Player Character]: "I feel so heavy..."
I tried reaching out to a shard.
It's... It's getting more difficult to move.
[Player Character]: "Ah!"
I can't get up!
ùï†ùî¶‡∏†ùìå‚ìîùê≤ ‡∏¨Ôº¢‚ìéùìí◊üùìê·îïùìùùìêùïï, ùíΩÔΩÑÂá†Œî-ùêÄ≈üùíΩ·ó™‚ìé·∂∞... ???
That voice again! Maybe...
[Player Character]: "Help... me...."
All I could hear was a snicker echoing...
–≥ùìî·ª£“Øùïùùìè–ñ ùìÉÔΩÖùìê‚ìéùìò‚Ç¨‚Ñì...
Through the mocking undertones... I felt some reassurance inside of me.
...
The world grew too bright to bear...

title: day_9_pool_intro
body:
...
*SPLASH*
[Player Character]: "GOOD JOB GIRLS AND GUYS! WE'RE TAKING A BREAK FROM PRACTICE!"
YAY!
That's was super fun Captain!
[Player Character]: "YAY! I'm glad you liked it!"
[Player Character]: "The way we we're all synchronized through our routine was sooo pretty!"
I get out of the pool to dry myself off.
The pool looks so pretty today, the water is soo shiny like sapphire...
The pool looks stra...
Wait... what was I about to say?
[Player Character]: "heehee, yeah I love swimming with you all!"
I wish we didn't have to leave tomorrow...
Everyone got visibly sad...
Leave? Tomorrow?
...what... what if...
...what if we don't leave?
Don't leave... stay here... forever...
Everyone's looking at each other, nodding.
[Player Character]: "heehee! Yeah were a family now! And we stick together!"
[Player Character]: "Okay! Everyone, I need to tell you all something!"
Captain: "We are playing a game today!"
Captain: "Ill be right back!"
I remember there being something at the the announcer booth. Something important for us...
Going up the stairs words keep repeating in my head..
Hehe... NOW! ‚º®‚≤∑-
I blink, and then I suddenly find myself in front of the announcer booth.
I see a usb in the machine and my finger about the press the play button... Is this right?
[Player Character]: "Is this what should happen? What am I about to cause?"
She... would want this... for your family..
Do you understand?
[Player Character]: "I do."
I press the play button.
The announcer booth audio clips for a second, and I head back down to my family.
Captain: "heehee... I recorded this game last night! I tootally forget what the game is, but I remember it being super fun!"
My voice beings to play!
Heeeeey everyone!
I want to record this super fun game I have, before I make myself forget it, heehee!
We all get to do a roadtrip! YAY!
All we need to do is get out of here heehee!
Find something we can use to go on our trip!
All we need to do is clean the pool together!
[current_character.name] has been doing a great job the whole trip!
We all need to do our part to support them! We're all more than a team!
Once the pool is properly cleaned, we can go on a family trip out of here!
I feel strange. Like I just fought against something inside me.
[Player Character]: "Okay, my loving family... let's win this!"
Captain: "GOOD JOB GIRLS AND GUYS! WE'RE TAKING A BREAK FROM PRACTICE!"
YAY!
[Player Character]: "That's was super fun Captain!"
Captain: "YAY! I'm glad you liked it!"
Captain: "The way we we're all synchronized through our routine was sooo pretty!"
[Player Character]: "heehee!"
I get out of the pool to dry myself off.
[Player Character]: "The pool looks so pretty today, the water is soo shiny like sapphire..."
[Player Character]: "The pool look stra..."
Phew, I stopped myself from saying something weird..
[Player Character]: "Nevermind, I'm having a great day!"
Captain: "heehee, yeah I love swimming with you all!"
I wish we didn't have to leave tomorrow...
Everyone got visibly sad...
...what... what if...
[Player Character]: "...what if we don't leave?"
Everyone looked at each other.. then they nodded their head.
Captain: "heehee! Yeah were a family now! And we stick together!"
I felt a growing sense of happiness wash over me.
It all felt great... all us all feel complete.
Captain: "Okay! Lets play a game!"
Captain: "Ill be right back!"
The Captain happily walks to the announcer booth.
Some of us are still in the pool and others are sitting at the edge off the pool using our feet to play with the water.
Then the audio from the announcer booth clips for a second, and we see the Captain doing a light run back to us.
[Player Character]: "Heeeey Captain! What's the super fun game we're gonna plaay today?"
Captain: "heehee... I recorded this game last night!"
Captain: "I tootally forget what the game is, but I remember it being super fun!"
The captain's voice beings to play!
Heeeeey everyone!
I want to record this super fun game I have, before I make myself forget it, heehee!
We all get to do a roadtrip! YAY!
All we need to do is get out of here heehee!
Find something we can use to go on our trip!
All we need to do is clean the pool together!
[current_character.name] has been doing a great job the whole trip!
We all need to do our part to support them! We're all more than a team!
Once the pool is properly cleaned, we can go on a family trip out of here!
Okay, my loving family, lets play!
Captain: "...I'm glad I recorded that."
Our Captain seemed off for a second.
Captain: "Okay! Lets play everyone!"

title: day_10_intro
body:
...
[Player Character]: "*yaaaaaaaaaawn*"
[Player Character]: "No silly dreams last night! I feel so free!"
I can't wait to see what today bring us!
I get up to leave the my room.
[Player Character]: "Ah! I feel soooo heavyyyyyyy..."
Grumply, I use my all strength to get out of bed.

title: day_10_courtyard_intro
body:
I pass by some of my teammates!
[Player Character]: "Heeeeey!"
Heeeeey!
We all give each other hugs!
Time to check on rest the family!
Our big moment is almost here!
[current_character.name], have you finished the Captain's game?
[Player Character]: "heehee, what game?"
pffft, I was just playing a small joke on you!
[Player Character]: "Very funny!"
I pout back at them.
[Player Character]: "Anyways I'm going to do my chores today! Love you all!"
Love you!
I really do love them all. They've been there every step of the way in my life...
I look up at the night sky, the lights are so pretty..
[Player Character]: "Thanks heehee! Okay now im really off to do my chores."
...and with one last hug, Im ready to start my night!

title: final_day
body:
[Player Character]: "Haha, I can't move anymore!"
heehee, the ground is shaking!
[Player Character]: "Ah!"
Those beautiful pillars of light started to sprout from our home.
All around me, near and far, pillars of light keep shooting from the ground.
[Player Character]: "Yaaaay!"
I felt myself being consumed by the beams... the bliss felt amazing...
[Player Character]: "I lo... ve.."
I heard chains rattling...
[Player Character]: "ah..."
*SLAM*
Wh-- what? Where am I...
...ùìâ‚íæŒ¨‰∏ÇÁà™ÂçÇùíÜ ùìªùëíùê£ùêç‚í∂ùî∞ùêù„Ñöùìã·∫∏—áÔΩÅ„Ñ•ùìô·ñáùêì!
Wha--? WhaAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: reception_area
body: [Player Character]: "I am in the reception area"

title: pool_area
body:
The pool shimmers with a purple, blue color
[Player Character]: "I am in the pool area"
[Player Character]: "I swam some laps in the pool. The milk boost made the training extra effective! (+2 Stamina)"
[Player Character]: "I swam some laps in the pool and built up my endurance. (+1 Stamina)"
[Player Character]: "My Stamina is now [new_stamina]."

title: library
body:
[Player Character]: "I am in the library area"
[Player Character]: "There's a heavy door here. It looks like it leads to a gym."
[Player Character]: "I think I can pry this open... Let me try."
You push against the door with all your might...
The door groans and slowly swings open!
[Player Character]: "Yes! The gym is now accessible."
[Player Character]: "The door is stuck tight. I'm not strong enough to force it open yet."
[Player Character]: "Maybe I can build up my stamina at the pool... (Need Stamina 2 or higher)"

title: gym
body:
[Player Character]: "I am in the gym"
[Player Character]: "I lifted weights and did strength training. The milk boost made it extra effective! (+2 Power)"
[Player Character]: "I lifted weights and built up my strength. (+1 Power)"
[Player Character]: "My Power is now [new_power]."

title: backyard
body: [Player Character]: "I am in the backyard"

title: shed_area
body: [Player Character]: "I am in the shed"

title: outside_front_area
body:
[Player Character]: "I am at the front of the building"
[Player Character]: "Let me check out these bushes..."
[Player Character]: "Wait, what's that behind them?"
[Player Character]: "There's a car in the ditch! It must have slid off the road."
[Player Character]: "This car is stuck pretty deep in the ditch."
[Player Character]: "I think I'm strong enough to push this out... Let me try."
You brace yourself against the car and push with all your might...
The car groans and slowly starts to move...
With one final heave, the car rolls out of the ditch!
[Player Character]: "Yes! I did it!"
[Player Character]: "I'm not strong enough to push this out yet."
[Player Character]: "I need more strength... (Need Power 5 or higher, currently [player_power])"
Are you sure you want to leave? (This will end the game)
[Player Character]: "I think I can leave now! Come on everyone we have to stop the source!"

choices.text: No, there is still more to do here

title: janitor_room_intructions
body:
[Player Character]: "Okay before I head to bed, gotta do this..."
[Player Character]: "It's so dark in here..."
[Player Character]: "Ah! Here some instructions."
[Player Character]: "Now... how do I clean the pool?"
[Player Character]: "Ah! Here the instructions."
\"Select three chemicals from the cabinet and then pour them into the mixer.\"
\"You will hear a beep when the machine is done mixing.\"
\"The last step is to pour that mixture into the pool.\"
\"I got some new chems for you all, so which three you mix in shouldn't matter.\"
\"Thank your for helping keep the pool clean! - PA \"
[Player Character]: "Alright, lets do this"

title: end_game
body:
Thank you for playing update 4 of Clean Pool! That's all the content for now!
Please support the game on my Patreon and following me on Itch!
If you have any feedback or bugs, please post on the tfgames.site or Itch discussion threads! I try my best to read and respond to them all.
Thank you for your support!
